detail_desc: Set with a hat and scarf in a soft rib knit. The hat has a pompom on top and turn-up at the hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed shawl collar, buttons down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Cycling shorts in ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cycling shorts in ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Court shoes in imitation patent leather with block heels and square toes. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester, and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.
Fully lined, low-cut swimsuit with adjustable shoulder straps and an integral bra with padded cups, space for breast forms and an elasticated hem.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a back pocket.

Short, fitted dress in recycled polyester chiffon with a V-neck, seam under the bust and short, gathered puff sleeves. Drawstring at the front of the skirt for a draped effect and a short flounce at the hem. Lined.

Short, fitted dress in recycled polyester chiffon with a V-neck, seam under the bust and short, gathered puff sleeves. Drawstring at the front of the skirt for a draped effect and a short flounce at the hem. Lined.
Wide, calf-length trousers in soft linen and viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in twill. Loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in twill. Loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.

Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a lace trim at the waist. Mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a lace trim at the waist. Mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Longer shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a narrow, detachable tie belt under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless, cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section at the sides and elasticated hem.
Low-heeled shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and gently chiselled toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky, patterned rubber soles.
Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Round, lace-trimmed neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties, short sleeves and a skirt with lace-trimmed, gathered tiers. Unlined.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded jersey tongue and shimmering metallic heel caps. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a padded jersey tongue and shimmering metallic heel caps. Jersey linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Block-coloured trainers in imitation leather and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Linings in mesh made from recycled polyester. Cotton twill insoles and patterned soles.

Block-coloured trainers in imitation leather and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Linings in mesh made from recycled polyester. Cotton twill insoles and patterned soles.
Short shorts in soft imitation leather with a high waist, detachable belt with D-rings, and side pockets. Lined.
Short, fitted shorts in soft imitation leather with a concealed zip in one side. Lined in a cotton blend.

Top in organic cotton jersey and a pair of culottes in viscose jersey. Top with short sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Culottes with elasticated smocking at the waist.
Top in organic cotton jersey and a pair of culottes in viscose jersey. Top with short sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Culottes with elasticated smocking at the waist.

Striped T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small embroidered detail on the chest and a narrow trim around the neckline. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a straight-cut hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim decorated with rhinestones. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with belt loops and pleats, a zip fly and button, side pockets and tapered legs. Relaxed fit.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and gently rounded hems.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and gently rounded hems.

Calf-length, double-layered coat in a felted wool blend with a large, detachable shawl. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Visible seam at the front, discreet side pockets and slits in the sides. Large loop at the back of the neck through which to attach the shawl. Unlined. The wool content of the coat is recycled. The polyester content of the coat is partly recycled.
Wide, calf-length, double-breasted coat in twill made from an Italian wool blend. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.
Wide, calf-length, double-breasted coat in twill made from an Italian wool blend. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined.

Long, double-breasted, straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut, ankle-length coat in a soft Tencel™ lyocell and wool blend with narrow notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Calf-length coat in a felted wool blend with a collar and buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets and discreet side pockets. Slightly longer at the back with rounded sides.

Strapless bandeau bras in microfibre with jersey-lined cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Side support and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Leggings in stretch imitation leather. High waist with concealed elastication.

T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders. Round neckline with decorative gathers.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders. Round neckline with decorative gathers.
Short-sleeved dress in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a visible zip at the back, front pockets and a detachable braided belt in imitation suede. Unlined.

Skirt in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and press-stud and patch front pockets. Unlined. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
